headline.main: R.A.F. HITS 6 SHIPS IN MEDITERRANEAN; Attacks Are Climax to a Week of Unusually Effective Raids on Axis Convoys

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Oct. 12 -- The Royal Air Force attacked Axis Mediterranean shipping Friday night and yesterday as the climax to a week of unusually effective convoy raiding. It damaged six ships and apparently sank at least one of them.
abstract: RAF hits 6 Axis ships, Mediterranean; Bengazi harbor, Berka and Benina airdromes, Bardia, Derna and Comiso airdrome, Sicily, raided; patrols fight, Tobruk; Itals minimize RAF damage on Vittoria, Sicily; claim Ital torpedo boat downed 3 Brit planes, Mediterranean

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS

snippet: CAIRO, Egypt, Oct. 12 -- The Royal Air Force attacked Axis Mediterranean shipping Friday night and yesterday as the climax to a week of unusually effective convoy raiding. It damaged six ships and apparently sank at least one of them....

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
